vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σᾰγήν-η,
[Refs 5th c.AD+]ἁγάνα (see. ἄγανα and compare σάγανα), ἡ, large drag-net for taking fish, seine, Ital. sagena, [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+]; hunting-net, [Refs]
__2 ={ἐπίπλοος} (c), [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (large) dragnet, a net with weights on the bottom and dragged through the water
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(large) dragnet, a net with weights on the bottom and dragged through the water
a large net, Mt. 13:47*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 大的捕魚網, 打撈網 (太 13:47)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 大的捕鱼网, 打捞网 (太 13:47)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: một lưới kéo lớn; một chiếc lưới
